name: Lipwig SL
tagline: An academic stochastic lot sizing solver.
body:
## About

Lipwig SL is an academic stochastic lot sizing solver written in Java. It was created during the dissertation project "Stochastic dynamic lot sizing with positive order lead time" of Andreas Popp at the Catholic University of Eichst√§tt-Ingolstadt.

## Documentation

A javadoc is [available](http://andipopp.github.io/Lipwig_SL/javadoc/) at this project page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
